name: Door
description: Generates and defines options for Door.

inputParameters.name: lintel_posts
inputParameters.description: (optional) If False, jack studs will not be generated and headers will butt directly onto king studs.

inputParameters.name: split_bottom_plate
inputParameters.description: (optional) If True, the bottom plate beam will be split into two beams.

inputParameters.name: custom_dimensions
inputParameters.description: (optional) From beam dimension component. These dimensions will override the default beam dimensions from Slab Configuration Set.

inputParameters.name: joint_overrides
inputParameters.description: (optional) From joint overrides component. Allows user to specify joints between specific beam types in a door frame.
